page.title: 08HUMOUR - CIRCA 1985
page.content: In 1066,William the Conqueror Came sailing over the sea. He came to do battle with England's King Harold..He certainly Hadn't come for his tea!!! Harold looked to the sky and alas his poor eye;Took an arrow which killed him quite dead.So{William the Conque} became King of England,and quickly went home to his bed. William said,"I'm broke,it's enough to make you choke!Harold has spent the blooming lot but... I'll get my men out to record all about;In my special big{DOMESDAY BOOK.} So by{1086}the book had been writ(ten It contained facts about people,land axes. Of cattle and sheep,of how much you keep, So William promptly introduced{TAXES. { crt.85
